solution_line_template: Cory takes {richard_time} + {cory_more_than_richard} = <<{richard_time}+{cory_more_than_richard}={cory_time}>>{cory_time} minutes to clean her room.
Blake takes {cory_time} - {blake_faster_than_cory} = <<{cory_time}-{blake_faster_than_cory}={blake_time}>>{blake_time} minutes to clean his room.
The three of them can clean their room in {richard_time} + {cory_time} + {blake_time} = <<{richard_time}+{cory_time}+{blake_time}={total_one_clean}>>{total_one_clean} minutes in all.
In a week, they spend {total_one_clean} x {times_per_week} = <<{total_one_clean}*{times_per_week}={total_weekly}>>{total_weekly} minutes cleaning their rooms.
